description: Change of use & conversion of existing 4 storey school building into 44 flats (36x1, 5x2, 3x3) erection of  new 4 storey residential block with accommodation in roof space comprising 38 flats (21x1, 17x2) provision of 81 parking spaces & landscaping.
site_name: The College Quarter ph 2&3 (Woolwich Poly Upper school)
site_number: The College Quarter ph 2&3 (Woolwich Poly Upper school)
